PAGE.p: Released versions of OpenConnect are available from the FTP site, and also over HTTP:
Release tarballs (since 3.13) are signed with the PGP key with fingerprint BE07 D9FD 5480 9AB2 C4B0 FF5F 6376 2CDA 67E2 F359.
The latest release is OpenConnect v9.11 (PGP signature), released on 2023-05-17 with the following changelog:

ul.li: Rebuild test suite certificate chains (which had expired: #609)
Fix stray (null) in URL path after Pulse authentication (4023bd95).
Fix config XML parsing mistake that left GlobalProtect ESP non-working in v9.10 (!475).
Fix case sensitivity in GPST header matching (!474).
Add external browser support for Windows ((#553).

PAGE.p: For older releases and change logs, see the changelog page.
The latest source code is available from the git repository at:
